title: Fragment of an Offering List
description:
Fragmentary limestone relief with offering list in four columns of hieroglyphs above which is a register decorated with large five-pointed stars.
Condition: General condition good. Left edge chipped.  Remains of blue and green paint on some of the hieroglyphs.

museum_location.name: Old Kingdom to 18th Dynasty, Egyptian Galleries, 3rd Floor

completeness.name: Best
completeness.description: All data has been vetted. Objects generally have quality photos and descriptions.

labels.content: Four columns of text in this fragment list offerings for Senwosret II to enjoy throughout eternity, including wine, beer, a copper bowl, and a container of festival perfume (the sign for “container” appears in the lower left). The hieroglyphs show considerable detail, as in the meticulous rendering of the man’s curly hair at the bottom of the second column from the left.

collections.name: Egyptian, Classical, Ancient Near Eastern Art
